00029 RFile::RFile( const UPath& name, void* handle, unsigned int flags )
00030 : RRsrc( name )
00031 , _handle( handle )
00032 , _data( 0 )
00033 , _size( 0 )
00034 , _flags( flags )
00035 {
00037         _size = FS_GetFileSize( _handle );
00038 }
00039 
00040 //----------------------------------------------------------
00041 RFile::~RFile()
00042 {
00043         FS_CloseFile( _handle );
00044         Purge();
00045 }

00052 //----------------------------------------------------------
00053 void
00054 RFile::Reset( void* handle, unsigned int flags )
00055 {
00057         _handle = handle;
00058         _flags = flags;
00059 
00061         Purge();
00062 
00064         _size = FS_GetFileSize( _handle );
00065 }

00067 //----------------------------------------------------------
00068 bool
00069 RFile::CanRead()
00070 {
00071         return ( _flags & FS_FILE_FLAG_READ ) != 0;
00072 }
00073 
00074 //----------------------------------------------------------
00075 bool
00076 RFile::CanWrite()
00077 {
00078         return ( _flags & FS_FILE_FLAG_WRITE ) != 0;
00079 }

00081 //----------------------------------------------------------
00082 bool
00083 RFile::Exists() const
00084 {
00085         return ( _handle != 0 );
00086 }

00088 //----------------------------------------------------------
00089 bool
00090 RFile::Reload() const
00091 {
00093         if ( !Exists() )
00094                 return false;
00095 
00097         Purge();
00098 
00100         _data = new char[ ( size_t )_size + 1 ];
00101 
00103         SFSFileReadBuffer_t readBuf;
00104         readBuf.buffer = ( volatile void* )_data;
00105         readBuf.complete = 0;
00106 
00108         __int64 curSize = _size;
00109         __int64 offset = 0;
00110         while ( curSize > 0 )
00111         {
00113                 unsigned int blockSize = ( unsigned int )( ( curSize > 0x40000000 ) ? 0x40000000 : curSize );
00114                 FS_ReadFile( &readBuf, _handle, offset, blockSize );
00115 
00117                 curSize -= blockSize;
00118                 offset += blockSize;
00119         }
00120 
00122         ( ( unsigned char* )readBuf.buffer )[ _size ] = '\0';
00123 
00125         if ( _size )
00126                 FS_Wait( &readBuf.complete );
00127 
00129         return true;
00130 }
00131 
00132 //----------------------------------------------------------
00133 void
00134 RFile::Purge() const
00135 {
00137         delete[] _data;
00138         _data = 0;
00139 }
00140 
00141 //----------------------------------------------------------
00142 const void*
00143 RFile::GetData() const
00144 {
00145         EnsureLoaded();
00146         return _data;
00147 }
00148 
00149 //----------------------------------------------------------
00150 __int64
00151 RFile::GetSize() const
00152 {
00153         return _size;
00154 }
00155 
00156 //----------------------------------------------------------
00157 void
00158 RFile::WriteData( __int64 offset, const void* src, unsigned int size )
00159 {
00161         if ( _data )
00162                 MemCopy( ( char* )_data + ( unsigned int )offset, src, size );
00163 
00165         SFSFileWriteBuffer writeBuffer;
00166         writeBuffer.buffer = src;
00167         writeBuffer.complete = 0;
00168         FS_WriteFile( _handle, offset, &writeBuffer, size );
00169 
00171         FS_Wait( &writeBuffer.complete );
00172 
00174         __int64 newSize = offset + size;
00175         if ( newSize > _size )
00176                 _size = newSize;
00177 }
00178

00184 //----------------------------------------------------------
00185 void
00186 RFile::EnsureLoaded() const
00187 {
00189         if ( !_data )
00190                 Reload();
00191 }
